name: Castle of Shikigami 2
storyline: In 2006, a "twisted castle" suddenly appeared in the sky above Tokyo. A variety of stories unfold around the god-hunting armaments housed in this gigantic castle.
summary: Castle of Shikigami 2 is the second installment of the dramatic shooter that gained popularity in the arcades, Castle of Shikigami. Players choose one of seven (+1?) characters, each with different unique abilities, and use their shots, special Shikigami attack, and bombs to destroy the enemy. The unique backgrounds of each character are intricately intertwined, creating an interesting storyline for the shooter.
